review_content:
I already knew I liked Nars blush formula. It doesn't irritate my dry sensitive skin or dry it out, but what I didn't know was how awesome this shade is! I've been looking for this shade for years. There was a great shade like this that Revlon use to put out, but it was discontinued years ago and it was my perfect shade. It's been at least ten years since that shade was discontinued. I'm so excited to have found this shade. This is the perfect shade for fair or light skin tones. If you hate wearing pinky pink blushes like I do, then this is the perfect find. Deep Throat has shimmer too but very minimal, noticeable only if someone is standing very close to you. Color lasts the entire day- does not oxidize or go patchy, does not highlight texture or pores. Will not only repurchase but look at more colours available to see if i can find another favourite!!

If this blush were a person you would hire it to do your taxes. The issue here is for 39.00 I don’t want that sort of blush. For 39.00 I want to be blown away. I want a product that I can get excited about. And this isn’t it. If you’re looking for something above average try Hourglass.

review_title: Incredible shade on light skin with brunette hair!
review_content:
Nars nails it again! I'm very particular about what I put on my face and my make-up is primarily clean and green. I have yet to find a company that nails the pigmented blush game better than Nars. Thank you, Nars! I purchased Savage (blush) about a month ago as I switched my hair color from longtime blonde to a darker brunette and needed to update my every-day shade of blush. I used Nars' Torrid religiously on the daily with my blonde hair. I'm light-skinned and using this blush with an ultra light hand works. Don't let application #1 daunt you if you put too much on! Buff it out and start light and layer it up next round. Grateful to have this as my long wear, daily go-to in the blush department. This blush also looks great with a minimal face of MU as the color adds the right amount of "punch" yet doesn't make you feel like the rest of your face is missing.

review_title: The Most Perfect Blush for 20 Years
review_content:
No matter how many times I try to switch to something else, maybe something a bit cheaper, I keep coming back. This blush is the absolute perfect color. I've dropped many of these over the years, and the blush shatters every time (although the mirror doesn't). And the way it shatters is almost impossible to fix with alcohol and re-pressing it.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
I bought this blush two months ago and I absolutely love the formula and the appearance on my pale skin. It has become my go to blush that I use everyday, however, the plastic surrounding the hinge of the compact has completely broken, meaning that the lid is not longer connected to the product. For something that I paid so much money for I expected better quality from the compact. I have never even dropped the blush, it has just been sitting at my vanity where I use it everyday. I still have a lot of product left since I have only had it for two months! Disappointed with Nars cutting corners on packaging.

review_content: I don't think the picture on the computer is accurate. I took a risk, knowing I could return it. I filtered by other cool fair/light complexions and looked for a natural/go to look. I think this is the perfect "everyday" blush...

review_title: IF YOUR MELANIN IS POPPING YOU NEED THIS
review_content: This is a review for all my dark-skin sisters. You need this blush in the shade SAVAGE. It compliments our skin tone beautifully. I personally use it as a blush and/or highlighter - it is so versatile. I inspired my best friend to get it and she uses it as a blush topper. Trust me you will look amazing wearing this shade but beware It is REALLY pigmented - a little goes a long way.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: best matte blush for tan skin!
review_content: LOVE this blush! I have medium tan skin and I love that this blush looIs so natural. If you’re looking for a matte blush, this is it. I hate shimmery blushes and this has 0 shimmer. The only warning I would give is to use VERY little. Just dip the brush in. Don’t go ham because you’ll get that clown effect real quick.
